I came up with the idea to incorporate a voice assistant feature. While discussing this with chatGPT, I learned about Picovoice. I plan to install Picovoice on an old Android phone and use it so that people can ask the mascot bot questions and receive answers. For example, if someone asks, “What are your robot’s dimensions?” the response would be, “29 by 29 inches.”\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eAny insight on this would be greatly
